mapper.update: update HSP_UHF_TRP set TRP_ID = #{trpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRP_NAM = #{trpNam,jdbcType=CHAR}, TRP_TYP = #{trpTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRP_CLS = #{trpCls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYP_PIC = #{typPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRP_STA = #{trpSta,jdbcType=CHAR}, MOD_USR_NO = #{modUsrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOD_USR_NAM = #{modUsrNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOD_TIM = #{modTim,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where TRP_SEQ = #{trpSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
select HSP_UHF_TRP_TRP_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into HSP_UHF_TRP (TRP_SEQ, TRP_ID, TRP_NAM, TRP_TYP, TRP_CLS, TYP_PIC, TRP_STA, BID_FLG, CRT_USR_NO, CRT_USR_NAM, CRT_TIM) values (#{trpSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trpNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trpTyp,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{trpCls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trpSta,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bidFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{crtUsrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtUsrNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTim,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
